4.eng-name: The Book on the Day of Friday
4.ara-name: كِتَاب الْجُمُعَةِ عَنْ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ

hadiths.text: Sahl bin Sa'd narrated:"We would not have lunch during the time of Allah's Messenger, nor would we have a siesta, until after the Friday prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْقَائِلَةِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About Having Siesta On Friday
